thread.title: BRIEF-Morgan Stanley CFO Jonathan Pruzan's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.8 Mln

title: BRIEF-Morgan Stanley CFO Jonathan Pruzan's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.8 Mln
text:
April 6, 2018 / 8:21 PM / in a minute BRIEF-Morgan Stanley CFO Jonathan Pruzan's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.8 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 6 (Reuters) - Morgan Stanley: 
* MORGAN STANLEY CFO JONATHAN PRUZAN’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.8 MILLION VS $9.3 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING 
* MORGAN STANLEY SAYS CHAIRMAN AND CEO JAMES GORMAN’S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $24.5 MILLION VS $21.2 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING 
* MORGAN STANLEY PRESIDENT COLM KELLEHER’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $21.8 MILLION VS $19.4 MILLION IN 2016 - SEC FILING 
* FOR 2017, RATIO OF ANNUAL TOTAL COMPENSATION OF CEO TO MEDIAN OF ANNUAL TOTAL COMPENSATION OF ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES WAS 192 TO 1 Source text: [ bit.ly/2GDzV89 ] Further company coverage:
